item.description:
http://theslutcracker.com/home.html

Come get in the holiday spirit with a performance  of the Nutcracker, but with a twist, a bump & grind.     This show is for mature audiences.

Wikipedia: "The Slutcracker is a burlesque, satirical version of The Nutcracker that is the creation of Babes in Boinkland troupe director Vanessa White. ..,. The performance incorporates burlesque and tango dancers, drag kings, hoopers, ballerinas, acrobats, and belly dancers in a retelling of Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky's ballet ..."
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us in the lobby. We'll grab seats about 20 minutes before showtime.
item.name: The Slutcracker
